rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0001
rows.name:
Maybe the report that Hugo received
has some implications for us...

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, it won't do us much good to stand
here and let our imaginations run wild.

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0003
rows.name:
Why don't we head to the boat's
strategy room and hear about it
for ourselves?

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0004
rows.name:
Yeah, I guess.
Any idea what it'll be about, Kasumi?

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0007
rows.name:
I don't know, really...
Perhaps the Nopon have finally
declared war on the Tirkin?

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0008
rows.name: Now that would be quite something!

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0009
rows.name:
Wouldn't it just. I'm just picturing
the carnage now. An empty field,
completely strewn with feathers...

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0010
rows.name:
Well whenever that great big dealipon's
over, we should get over there and stuff
ourselves a couple of mattresses!

rows.label: campfev11_1400_msg0012
rows.name:
It's good to see you all have such
sensitivity to the miseries of war...
